requiredFlags.name: --name
requiredFlags.description: Name of the generated Visualforce Component. The name can be up to 40 characters and must start with a letter.

optionalFlags.name: --flags-dir
optionalFlags.description: Import flag values from a directory.

optionalFlags.name: --template
optionalFlags.description: Template to use for file creation. Supplied parameter values or default values are filled into a copy of the template.

optionalFlags.name: --output-dir
optionalFlags.description: Directory for saving the created files. The location can be an absolute path or relative to the current working directory. The default is the current directory.

optionalFlags.name: --api-version
optionalFlags.description: Override the api version used for api requests made by this command.
